document_data.name: Mantelia Parsuns
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Mantelia Parsuns''' was a [[half-elf]] [[aristocrat]] and [[sorcerer|sorceress]] and ruler of the city of [[Undumor|Emmech]] (later known as Undumor) in [[1374 DR]]. She owned a large amount of land from Emmech to the [[Dragonjaw Mountains]].
